item.title: CVE-2023-46201|2024-08-28T15:07:39.134Z -- jeff%20sherk -- auto%20login%20new%20user%20after%20registration
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jeff Sherk Auto Login New User After Registration allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Auto Login New User After Registration: from n/a through 1.9.6.
